code: import{ADD_PRODUCT,REMOVE_PRODUCT,INCREASE_QUANTITY,DECREASE_QUANTITY,EMPTY_CART}from"../../types";export function addProduct(product){return{type:ADD_PRODUCT,payload:{product:product}};}export function removeProduct(product){return{type:REMOVE_PRODUCT,payload:{product:product}};}export function increaseQuantity(product){return{type:INCREASE_QUANTITY,payload:{product:product}};}export function decreaseQuantity(product){if(product.amountInCart<1){return{type:REMOVE_PRODUCT};}else{return{type:DECREASE_QUANTITY,payload:{product:product}};}}export function emptyQuantity(){return{type:EMPTY_CART};}
